description:
Looking to be in his late twenties, Nanaya is a mysterious, blue-haired shin who wears an eyepatch over his right eye, with three vertical gashes running underneath. He first appears as the overconfident main antagonist, able to summon and control kokuchi into possessing people.
It is later revealed that he was working for http://anidb.net/ch13149 [Homurabi].
Underestimating his opponents leads him to die in battle, by an arrow from http://anidb.net/ch12177 [Haruka]`s crossbow.
name: Nanaya
